body_content.explanation: (of a play, film, story, etc.) both serious and funny:
examples: The director's latest film is a sericomic portrait of a man struggling to recover after his wife dies in an accident.
The seriocomic tone of the TV show is shaped by moments of tense drama interspersed with wry humour.
Her latest novel is a serio-comic wander around the big questions of life.
This serio-comical writer has been making low-budget documentaries for many years.
